name: Zone VX
description:
--- INCOMING TRANSMISSION ---

We have detected hostile activity on the surface of %%:\\&##@@^%// we are sending you to deal with it.
You are authorized to use any of the 5 standard issue weapons.
We have pre-loaded your vehicle with adaptive improvements for you to select to suit combat.
The vehicle is also equipped to use unstable minerals from the surface.

Eliminate all hostile activity and return.
Good Luck.

--- END TRANSMISSION ---
